title: Follow-up on the server issues - 25/02/2015
body:
Summoners,

At 0231 AEDT this morning we experienced an outage on one of the links connecting our Oceanic League of Legends servers to the internet.  This shouldn't have caused a huge issue (we have multiple connections in place), but for some reason it caused some knock-on problems to our game server networking while that link was down.  As a result, games in progress were affected and new games did not start for around 20 minutes (the duration of the outage).  Loss forgiven was enabled while this was all happening.  

Once the affected link came back online, we were able to get the game servers up and running and everything working normally again.

While this was related to a third-party outage, we'll be spending time this week looking over exactly what happened and why it affected our network so heavily.  We'll be looking to make improvements to our set-up to prevent against this in the future.

See you on the rift!

Mindstar
